item.title: Simplicity-X | 718 VPS Hosted | Clans | Grand Exchange | NEW
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Alright bro I understand what you’re saying, I suggest maybe finding another one of your features and adding them in here and remove the picture of your VPS specs as you already mentioned your VPS previously.

Read full topic

item.title: Simplicity-X | 718 VPS Hosted | Clans | Grand Exchange | NEW
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

thanks for the reply, what sort of content would you expect in a runescape private server?

grand exchange isnt in every server, most servers dont have clans working, we encourage gambling so we made a gambling area.

im not really good at advertising and picking out good features, i am always working on the server and implementing new content. everything added so far i have had to think of my self, i would like to get some player feedback now that i have put it up to the public so that i can get some suggestions on what to add and fix next.

Read full topic
item.source: Simplicity-X | 718 VPS Hosted | Clans | Grand Exchange | NEW

item.title: Simplicity-X | 718 VPS Hosted | Clans | Grand Exchange | NEW
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I don’t know, the features you mention in your server should already be in a typical 718 server. Having a decent VPS doesn’t make up for lack of content. I think you should concentrate more on the actual content of your server rather than how good your VPS is bruh

Read full topic
